Just thought I should comment on this. First of all, if you have windows 7, what's going to happen when you try to play this is windows 7 is going to reject the drivers that come with this game. Then your going to have to download the newest driver from Tages here, http://www.tagesprotection.com/main.htm

Then, when you try again, it's going to tell you to insert the original dvd disc, because Tages is designed to thwart these kind of cracked games. This rip is unplayable on windows 7 without a no-disc crack, which is not included, I don't know if it even exists.

Windows 7 error: Steam error / Application load error 5:0000065434..

Sad. =(
